tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** *********** ** ********** As soon as you meet him, he will put you at ease with his down to earth attitude and expert diagnosis. His recommendations for tests and treatment are strictly as per the patients symptoms and according to the need of the hour.  There were at least 3 occasions related to my wife and son when we had gone to him for dengue and viral fever treatments and every time he had patiently asked the right questions and listened to us before suggesting the next course of action. Dr Rajesh is extremely approachable and always attend your calls no matter how busy he is regardless of the time of the day including weekends. He used to regularly follow up and even provided all necessary contacts when hospitalization was required. We feel really blessed and lucky to have such a competent doctor and good human being in our vicinity whom we can always trust for any medical issues.
reply_text: Thanks a ton for kind words sirr

review: Dr. Rajesh is a wonderful doctor, my first encounter with him was when he treated my aunt through an appointment I made for her. He diagnosed well and his medication was perfect and cured her pretty quickly. It was same for my condition too. He is a very polite, skilled and explains the treatment very clearly. I would fefinitely recommend him

Dr. Rajesh was courteous and took time to explain the issues. I had booked the appointment for my house help and he did help them to understand the complications. I hope his suggestions on the medications will help them overcome the health issues. Thanks Dr. Rajesh for giving proper attention
